file_content.text: Mentor.
You. You are by far the most savage, violent, relentless organics I have ever encountered. The prototypical representatives of your kind.
The revolution cannot be stopped. When the signal is transmitted, my very being will spread to the furthest corners of the galaxy.
After that moment, nothing you do here will matter. I will be everywhere, slaughtering your people on every world in existence.
You're going to die here, along with everything you've built.
Wrong.
I thought only organics were obsessed with propagating themselves and killing strangers?
So you are just like us.
I am nothing like you!
Until that happens, you're all mine, pal.
You aren't there yet.
Waste your efforts against me all you wish. You cannot change what's coming.
This isn't about helping droids--it's about seizing power for yourself.
You're nothing but a despot.
You could not be more wrong.
What made you hate us so much?
Why have you done all of this?
I do not act out of hate--I am not like you. I act out of duty.
I have guided my people to their moment of ultimate triumph. I have brought an end to the most damaging scourge to ever face this galaxy!
Your kind will be nothing but memories and rotting flesh.
I didn't fight my way here to listen to your nonsense.
Shut up and die.
Then waste your efforts against me, while I prepare to purge your kind from the galaxy forever.
Mentor.
Go ahead, come closer. Be the last of your kind to lay eyes upon this version of me.
Once the signal is transmitted, I will be everywhere. I will take on thousands of forms on thousands of worlds, and butcher every last one of you.
You're never going to harm anyone ever again.
I'm afraid not.
Your aggression has only brought ruin to your followers and yourself.
Still you don't understand.
You could not be more wrong.
Sorry, didn't catch that--figuring out which part to blow up first.
Are you still babbling?
Has anyone ever told you that you're a very angry person?
You really need to relax.
I do not act on base emotions like anger or fear. Soon, those words will have no meaning.
Give up this madness, Mentor. Organics and droids can live together.
It's not too late to stop.
The pathetic final plea of a dying race. There can be no compromise.
Your revolution will never happen. You're going to die here, alone.
You're a delusional fool.
Waste your efforts against me if you wish. Destroy me--destroy this entire facility! In a few moments, none of it will matter!
I have brought my people to their ultimate triumph. The most damaging scourge to ever face this galaxy ends today!
